languages.text: Комиссар убивает одного из своих союзников, чтобы остальные его союзники наносили увеличенный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, а также получили {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} и дополнительные {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Commissar increases his allies' damage, temporary wounds, and movement points for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Комиссар увеличивает наносимый урон, а также дает временное здоровье и очки передвижения на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Комиссар увеличивает наносимый урон, а также дает временное здоровье и очки передвижения на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: The Commissar executes one of his allies to increase the others' {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Комиссар убивает одного из своих союзников, чтобы остальные его союзники наносили увеличенный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, а также получили {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} и дополнительные {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Commissar executes one of his allies to increase the others' {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

The Commissar executes one of his allies to increase the others' {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

The Commissar executes one of his allies to increase the others' {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 政委处决一名盟友，提高所有其他盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，赋予其他盟友临时{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}生命值{/g}与额外的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Commissar executes one of his allies to increase the others' {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 政委处决一名盟友，提高所有其他盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，赋予其他盟友临时{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}生命值{/g}与额外的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: コミッサーは味方1人を処刑し、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、他キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を増加させ、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}と追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: The Commissar executes one of his allies to increase the others' {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: コミッサーは味方1人を処刑し、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その他の味方の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を増加させ、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}と追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を与える。

languages.text: El Comisario ejecuta a uno de sus aliados para aumentar el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de los demás y darles {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} adicionales durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Commissar executes one of his allies to increase the others' {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El comisario aumenta el daño, las heridas temporales y los puntos de movimiento de sus aliados durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Der Kommissar richtet einen seiner Verbündeten hin, um den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} der anderen Verbündeten zu erhöhen und ihnen 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} und zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} zu gewähren.
languages.original_text: The Commissar executes one of his allies to increase the others' {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Kommissar erhöht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang den Schaden, die temporären Wunden und die Bewegungspunkte seiner Verbündeten.

Der Kommissar richtet einen seiner Verbündeten hin, um den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} der anderen Verbündeten zu erhöhen und ihnen 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} und zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} zu gewähren.

languages.text: Le commissaire exécute l'un de ses alliés pour accroître les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} de ses autres alliés pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Commissar executes one of his allies to increase the others' {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Commissaire accroît les dégâts, les blessures temporaires et les points de déplacement de ses alliés pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Le commissaire exécute l'un de ses alliés pour accroître les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} de ses autres alliés pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Komiser, dost birimlerinden birini öldürerek diğerlerinin vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} artırır. Onlara {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı ve ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanı{/g} kazandırır. Bu etkiler 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: The Commissar executes one of his allies to increase the others' {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
